price: Akasema: Haiwi mimi nimsujudie mtu uliye muumba kwa udongo unaotoa sauti, unao tokana na matope yenye sura.
arabic: قَالَ لَمۡ أَكُن لِّأَسۡجُدَ لِبَشَرٍ خَلَقۡتَهُۥ مِن صَلۡصَٰلٖ مِّنۡ حَمَإٖ مَّسۡنُونٖ
footnotes: Iblisi akasema: Si shani yangu mimi kumsujudia mtu uliye muumba kwa udongo mkavu, wenye kutoa sauti ukigongwa, nao umegeuka rangi, wenye kutiwa sura.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla lam akun li-asjuda libasharin khalaqtahu min ṣalṣālin min ḥama-in masnūnin
